title: Project Summary View
description: Create a view named project_summary that shows each project name and status.
story: The planning office needs a stable view of project status. Build a view so the team can query project name and status quickly.
hint: Use CREATE VIEW project_summary AS SELECT name, status FROM projects;
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS projects CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE projects (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), status VARCHAR(20), budget INTEGER);
